block.p: ALTAVISTA CO., London, named Pierre Paperon, formerly a managing director at AltaVista France, to the post of president for Europe.
BEAR STEARNS COS., New York, named Ilan Kaufthal a senior managing director and vice chairman for investment banking. He had been a vice chairman at the investment banking unit of Schroders P.L.C.
ALTAVISTA CO., London, named Pierre Paperon, formerly a managing director at AltaVista France, to the post of president for Europe.
BEAR STEARNS COS., New York, named Ilan Kaufthal a senior managing director and vice chairman for investment banking. He had been a vice chairman at the investment banking unit of Schroders P.L.C.

REVLON INC., New York, named Douglas Greeff chief financial officer, succeeding Frank Gehrmann, who resigned. Mr. Greeff had been managing director and co-head for leverage finance at Salomon Smith Barney.

TICKETMASTER ONLINE-CITYSEARCH INC., Pasadena, Calif., named Charles Conn, chief executive, to the post of chairman, succeeding Robert Kavner, who is retiring. John Pleasants, president, succeeds Mr. Conn in the additional post of chief executive.
